meanings.definition: Hommoses (verb): to mix or blend ingredients together to create a smooth paste
meanings.sent1: She hommoses the ingredients in the bowl to make a delicious dip.
meanings.sent2: I always hommoses the batter thoroughly to ensure a perfect cake.
meanings.sent3: The chef hommoses the sauce with precision, like an artist creating a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her voice hommoses with the melody, creating a harmonious blend of sound.
meanings.sent5: The colors hommoses on the canvas, forming a beautiful painting.

meanings.definition: Hommoses (noun): a Middle Eastern dish made from mashed chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, and garlic
meanings.sent1: For lunch, she enjoyed a plate of hommoses with pita bread.
meanings.sent2: The hommoses at the restaurant was creamy and flavorful.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he could eat hommoses every day and never get tired of it.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of hommoses filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The hommoses was the star of the party, disappearing quickly from the table.

meanings.definition: Hommoses (adjective): relating to or characteristic of the Middle Eastern dish hummus
meanings.sent1: She prepared a hommoses platter for the gathering.
meanings.sent2: The hommoses recipe called for fresh ingredients and a dash of love.
meanings.sent3: The hommoses aroma wafted through the room, tempting everyone.
meanings.sent4: His shirt had a hommoses stain from the delicious dip at lunch.
meanings.sent5: The hommoses flavor was authentic, transporting her back to the streets of Beirut.
